title: Describe Your Experience with League with a Champion Quote
body:
As a former rager and debater:

{{champion:254}} "Punch First, Ask Questions While Punching."

replies.body: {{champion:136}} "Boop".
The cycle of life and death continues{{champion:75}}

{{champion:240}} "Just 'cause they're our team don't mean we can trust 'em."

Actually, a ton of Kled's quotes apply.
{{champion:84}} So many noobs; will matchmaking ever find true balance?
"The past is a tapestry of what lies ahead."
{{champion:240}} "HOLY SH*T, WHERE ARE WE? guess we'll have to kill our way out"

{{champion:96}} "Feeding time!"
{{champion:28}} "Time to feed..."
{{champion:77}}  "Our rage is beyond your control."
{{champion:157}}: No cure for fools.
"A lot of people want me nerfed - they call it balance. I'm the only one who knows the truth. All I have left is the salt on the boards."

{{champion:45}} YOU DENY THE DARKNESS IN YOUR HEARTS!!! YOU DENY YOUR POWER!!!
(Me when I'm not trying to get tilted)
EEEHHH HEHEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEHEHEEEEEEEH

"The Darker the night, the brighter the stars."

And basically anything else Braum says.
{{champion:98}}: A demonstration of superior judgement. (yes... I am a cocky S.O.B.)
{{champion:76}} "It's mating season"
{{champion:111}}  "Drag them down"

{{champion:21}} How do you like my guns, Shock and Awe?

(in reference to the fact I can often surprise people with scary good plays with my main champs)

{{champion:412}} "What delightful agony we shall inflict"
Me when tilted
{{champion:202}} "I'm misunderstood. Beauty can't be evil"
Me when I'm tilting the enemy{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

~~I kind of wished champion icons worked on mobile.~~

Jarvan IV: "Today is a good day to die!"
Ok.

As someone who has stayed up late playing league this fits quite well.
{{champion:96}}: No rest
{{champion:8}} Go ahead B-
